query: Can you craft a travel plan for a party of 3 leaving from Columbus and heading towards Charlotte? Our travel dates are from March 29th to March 31st, 2022, giving us a total of 3 days. We require accommodations that allow pets as we will be bringing ours. We also prefer to have entire rooms to ourselves and intend to forego self-driving during this trip. For all of this, our budget is set at $3,200.
